# Show generated code is noted in report.

! gospel ./...
! stderr .
cmp stdout expected_output

-- go.mod --
module dummy
-- main.go --
package main

// mistooken
func main() {
}
-- generated.go --
// Leading comment.
// Code generated by hand DO NOT EDIT.

package main

// mistooken
func foo() {
}
-- not_generated.go --
package main

// Code generated by hand DO NOT EDIT.

// mistooken
func bar() {
}
-- other/main.go --
package main

// mistooken
func main() {
}
-- other/generated.go --
// Leading comment.
// Code generated by hand DO NOT EDIT.

package main

// mistooken
func foo() {
}
-- other/not_generated.go --
package main

// Code generated by hand DO NOT EDIT.

// mistooken
func bar() {
}
-- expected_output --
generated.go:6:4: "mistooken" is misspelled in comment (generated file)
	// [33;1;3mmistooken[0m
main.go:3:4: "mistooken" is misspelled in comment
	// [31;1;3mmistooken[0m
not_generated.go:5:4: "mistooken" is misspelled in comment
	// [31;1;3mmistooken[0m
other/generated.go:6:4: "mistooken" is misspelled in comment (generated file)
	// [33;1;3mmistooken[0m
other/main.go:3:4: "mistooken" is misspelled in comment
	// [31;1;3mmistooken[0m
other/not_generated.go:5:4: "mistooken" is misspelled in comment
	// [31;1;3mmistooken[0m
